a command, try it at the console

that when my other computer (a kubuntu one) is off, I have internet fine, but when it is on, ubuntu can't get internet, only windows
I have internet in ubuntu when the other comp in the house is off, but when it is on internet only works in windows
hmmm, is the ubuntu one using dhcp?
if there is an ip address conflict, it could explain the weird behavior
that is weird man, I'd try checking the ips
alright, so what would I do if the ips are the same?
set them manually to something different
and if they aren't the same, then we've eliminated a possible ssue
